analysis: Market analysis indicates positive momentum favoring buyers. RSI at 82.31 indicates overbought territory, suggesting caution for long positions. Money Flow Index at 79.00 suggests balanced volume distribution. MACD showing trend transition, awaiting confirmation. Price extended above Bollinger upper band, reversal risk elevated. Price structure supports bullish continuation with MA and SAR confirmation.
